programme.title: Premier League Review: 2011/12
programme.desc: A review of the 2011/12 season. As the competition entered its 20th year, Man City won their first title in dramatic fashion and Wigan produced a great escape to avoid the drop.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2012/13
programme.desc: A review of the 2012/13 season. Sir Alex Ferguson ended his managerial career as Manchester United clinched their 13th Premier League title and FA Cup winners Wigan were relegated.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2013/14
programme.desc: A review of the 2013/14 season. Manchester City clinched their second Premier League title, Jose Mourinho returned to Chelsea and Tony Pulis masterminded a great escape at Palace.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2014/15
programme.desc: A review of the 2014/15 season. Eden Hazard's superb form helped Chelsea clinch their fifth title, while newly-promoted Burnley and QPR made immediate returns to the Championship.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2015/16
programme.desc: A review of the 2015/16 season. Leicester City shocked the footballing world, Jose Mourinho's second tenure at Chelsea came to an end and Newcastle dropped into the second tier.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2016/17
programme.desc: Take a look back at the 2016/17 Premier League season as Chelsea win their fifth Premier League title and reigning champions Leicester set a new record for worst title defence.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2017/18
programme.desc: A look back at the 2017/18 Premier League season as Manchester City win their third title, Mohamed Salah scores 32 goals for Liverpool and Stoke's top flight status ends.

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2018/19
programme.desc: A look back at the 2018/19 Premier League season that was competitive until the very end, with fans captivated by an epic title race between Manchester City and Liverpool.

programme.title: Classic Premier League

programme.title: Classic Premier League
